text: Deliciously creamy-tasting with rich butterscotch ribbons, this frozen treat’s a sweet tooth’s dream.
No artificial colours, prepared from natural sources

Per  1/2 cup  (125 ml)Amount% DVCalories1200%Carbohydrate21g7%Fibre0g0%Sugars16g0%Fat3.5g5%Cholesterol20mg0%Saturated Fat3g15%Trans Fat0g0%Protein1g0%Sodium65mg3%Amount% DVCalcium6%Iron0%Vitamin A0%Vitamin C0%

Modified milk ingredients, sugar, milk ingredients, butterscotch ripple (glucose, sugar, water, glucose-fructose, brown sugar, milk ingredients, hydrogenated soybean oil, salt, pectin, caramel, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, citric acid), glucose, coconut oil, mono- and diglycerides, propylene glycol monostearate, cellulose gum, carob bean gum, carrageenan, artificial flavour, colour. May contain peanuts and tree nuts.
